description: Attempts to retrieve a fleet ID that is associated with an alias. Specify a unique alias identifier. If the alias has a SIMPLE routing strategy, Amazon GameLift returns a fleet ID. If the alias has a TERMINAL routing strategy, the result is a TerminalRoutingStrategyException. All APIs by task.

parameters.name: AliasId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the alias that you want to retrieve a fleet ID for. You can use either the alias ID or ARN value.

nested_items.name: FleetId
nested_items.description: The fleet identifier that the alias is pointing to.

nested_items.name: FleetArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name ( ARN) associated with the GameLift fleet resource that this alias points to.
